scenario.name: Royal Navy Type 45 destroyer
scenario.description:
Places 1 destroyer in Sognefjorden, longest fjord in Norway at 240k - nearest airport Sogndal
Notes: x, y, z-offset-m The distance in meters of the Fresnel Lens Optical Landing System (FLOLS) from the carrier model origin. max-lat, min-lat Defines an operating box in terms of the max and min lat excursions from the start position max-lon, min-lon Defines an operating box in terms of the max and min lon excursions from the start position TACAN-channel-ID Defines a TACAN channel for display purposes only
